Html:
Project version available in downloads section is a bit old now.
Also there are quite a few differences between latest version and one in the downloads section.

When will be available new downloadble version?
I am confused should I use recommended version (presumably stable) or newer with new features and goodies?

yes, I really need to get a new version uploaded (will be NAudio 1.4). Use the latest source code and build it yourself is the recommendation for all new projects.

Mark
